body:
If a set-based (new type) selector is used with statefulsets, the statefulset breaks and never starts a pod. The reason is [this](https://github.com/kubernetes/apimachinery/blob/bfe7139b14565386b4470736ca765bf21616b60e/pkg/labels/labels.go#L157) selector conversion helper.

Reproduce with:
```yaml
$ cat grin.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: grin
  labels:
    app: grin
spec:
  ports:
  - port: 13413
    targetPort: 13413
    name: http
  - port: 13414
    targetPort: 13414
    name: p2p
  clusterIP: None
  selector:
    app: grin
---
apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: grin
spec:
  serviceName: grin
  replicas: 1
  updateStrategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
      - {key: app, operator: In, values: [grin]}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grin
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/kargakis/grin:0.1
        name: grin
        command:
        - grin
        - server
        - run
        ports:
        - containerPort: 13413
          name: http
        - containerPort: 13414
          name: p2p
```
```console
$ kc create -f grin.yaml
service "grin-public" created
service "grin" created
statefulset "grin" created
$ kc get sts
NAME      AGE
grin      1h
$ kc get controllerrevision
No resources found.
$ kc get po
No resources found.
```
Controller manager logs:
```console
E0202 13:02:28.502538   26447 stateful_set.go:399] Error syncing StatefulSet default/grin, requeuing: invalid selector: [app in (grin)]
E0202 13:02:28.663007   26447 stateful_set.go:399] Error syncing StatefulSet default/grin, requeuing: invalid selector: [app in (grin)]
E0202 13:02:28.983965   26447 stateful_set.go:399] Error syncing StatefulSet default/grin, requeuing: invalid selector: [app in (grin)]
E0202 13:02:29.624798   26447 stateful_set.go:399] Error syncing StatefulSet default/grin, requeuing: invalid selector: [app in (grin)]
E0202 13:02:30.905600   26447 stateful_set.go:399] Error syncing StatefulSet default/grin, requeuing: invalid selector: [app in (grin)]
E0202 13:02:33.466074   26447 stateful_set.go:399] Error syncing StatefulSet default/grin, requeuing: invalid selector: [app in (grin)]
E0202 13:02:37.382397   26447 stateful_set.go:399] Error syncing StatefulSet default/grin, requeuing: invalid selector: [app in (grin)]
```
```console
$ kc version
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"8", GitVersion:"v1.8.4", GitCommit:"9befc2b8928a9426501d3bf62f72849d5cbcd5a3", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2017-11-20T05:28:34Z", GoVersion:"go1.8.3", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"10+", GitVersion:"v1.10.0-alpha.1.245+dddee913926377-dirty", GitCommit:"dddee9139263775670d3ed94b788c8abc06d5c2b", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2018-01-24T12:16:32Z", GoVersion:"go1.9.2", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

title: set-based selectors are broken in statefulsets
